PawnShop.Title: Pirate Pawn Shop
PawnShop.Description: The pirate pawn shop be where ye sell yer loot fer doubloons.
PawnShop.TargetLabel: Parley with the Pawn Shop Captain
PawnShop.ShopClosed: The pawn shop be closed, matey!

Smelting.MenuDescription: Smelt yer loot to forge new treasures.
Smelting.SmeltingSuccess: Ye smelted the booty down, savvy!

Warnings.DoNotHave: Ye don't have this booty, scallywag!
Warnings.InvalidItem: This booty can't be smelted, matey!
